content: mm i'm not a medical doctor, but i am working on a masters and private research for machine learning, so i'm certainly "well-equipped" in my field of choice, in the same fashion a surgeon would be. i entirely understand the doubt, and it's not like im about to try and put my name out there to prove anything :P what i will say is when the first artificial consciousness is made, you can be sure i had a hand in it!

certainly nose a bit "larger" than average (still fits my face though! ), face shape just about (i have a rather strong jawline but its not TOO built) , if you want we can attribute the surgical mask to being "capable/precise" in my work, though i will say i don't usually wear masks, if ever. overall pretty decent for a first time!
no problem! a simple "scry what i look like" query then, and i'll be sure to provide feedback :) can use either LSL or LC for initials, and female.
would you want to do a read which has a known answer to practice a bit?

coming up on a couple years, few months trip abusing and rest lurking/anon. seems pretty common that people come and go, and even the "new" readers that you see can sometimes just be old readers under a new name/anon and testing a new deck or method. just the ebb and flow

sure thing! i'll do a read on literally anything, so long as i don't see it altering your future in a negative fashion. (and sorry for the wait! im on and off at my computer >_>) >3 of Spades, Ace of Spades, 9 of Hearts, Jack of Clubs, Ace of Hearts i take this to mean that you'll likely find yourself taken with someone, overriding even rational instinct against them, i. e. red flags. the spades together signify quite a bit of trouble one way or another in the love department, but the hearts are a positive sign that you'll be able to achieve something nice on the other side, if you can smartly chart the waters, so to speak. basically, don't go for the crazy until you can properly verify the craziness! !

i can! but i don't have a great question at the moment :( just tag me with yours and maybe i'll come up with one!  just about right. "parasitic" but not by its own or anyone else's volition, and intertwined with me and another person. they are entirely locked in their spot for now, and it's one of my missions to create a bridge between here and there to "give them life", of some kind. cut them off from the connection and let them form their own energy, if possible. thanks for doing this! and as for your read; >9 of Spades, 5 of Diamonds, 4 of Hearts, 9 of Clubs essentially, you're a little bit stuck at the moment, not due to your own fault. the timeline is purposefully making things a bit hard to get anywhere meaningful in your love life, as a hurdle to jump over before you can get to the next spot. best moves for now show that you need to be able to separate your rationality from your feelings, and rely on the former. if you get a strong handle on this skill, with some time, the proper opportunity will show for you to take advantage of (the fruit of your next gf's! )

just allow me a bit to shuffle and i'll have it answered! the occult question is less of a "question" and more of a "ping", to simplify. there's a certain being in astral that i'm directly connected with (they're friendly, just lonely! ) and i like to have people "reach out" with a soul read every once in a while, just to prod their essence, as you would taking someone's pulse. if you are okay with doing this, their "number" is 13, and initial H. if not, i'll come up with something else, no worries at all! !  that sounds about right. reframing success from spreading the word to many people, instead to having as large an impact on the right people. appreciate it! !  makes me happy to hear, but also sad. they do tend to want to reach out when they can, but they are just so busy nowadays it's next to impossible, and i'm almost always asleep when they have free time. i'm glad that they are actually working on bettering themselves now, rather than wallowing as before. never could quite give them the right advice to break through.

sure thing! i'm sticking around for a lil while anyways. tag me with your q, ill try and think of another one for myself that wont change things >_> (oh and please say whether you're open to a unique occult read or not! !)

no problem! as for non occult, i'll take a reading on how successful i will be in growing my "presence" online (imbue yourself with positive vibes for it please! ! :D) and that's essentially the vibe i got. that you need to have a light framework going in, but if you were to work on an entire script and practice it, it'll fall apart somehow. jack of diamonds falling means my deck REALLY wanted me to tell you to trust in the moment presenting itself and working through you.  >3 of Spades, King of Spades, 8 of Diamonds, 10 of Diamonds on the outset, i didn't feel like there was something you were missing, but i pulled for a "blind spot/advice" anyways, and came back with a pretty clear "you're a bit unlucky" at the moment. essentially you might be missing signs from the timeline (or ignoring them in favor of your own choices) and it's not being too kind to you in return. whether this is something you did or didn't know beforehand, can't say! but it certainly isn't something i'll tell you off from either. i've had my own fair share of bad times inflicted upon me because i was stubbornly sticking to my own route, against the timeline's wishes. and it DID eventually work out, but it's not an easy path to divert the flow of things! essentially, take this as a marker of how you're moving along at the moment, and how you want to participate in your future. as for my q, i would like to know how my friend L is doing, mentally or physically. we haven't been able to reach out as often due to complementing sleep schedules and large distance causing a greater gap, but i still care for them, and want to know if they're getting along better now than before.
no worries! i'll instead ask whether you want to read for something known, or unknown :) and just tag me with your question!

>Jack of Diamonds (dropped) , 2 of Clubs, 9 of Spades, Light Joker i'd take this to mean that the timing will be perfect for you to succeed, but there will be a high chance of flopping as well. the light joker signifies that it's going to literally be a skill check for you heh (as in, whether you are confident and can execute on your speech) . there's going to be proper set up for you, but maybe also means something that's hard to follow up. the clubs signify a little bit of intuitive flow, which makes me feel like your prior "script" might end up fucked a little bit from the "buildup" but if you keep yourself open the right words and all will flow from you easy as anything else. good luck! !oh, and as for my question, would you like something rather mundane or a little bit occult? (safe as much as you can trust anyone online saying an occult read is safe! >_>)

offering trades! ! making a new thread as well, momentarily--

it's perfectly fine to wait a bit as well. there's nothing negative in store if you continue on as you are for a while. but as i said, at some point the shoe will fall and it'll be up to you to either fix it, or let it eat you up. and i don't like having my querents drown! :P

no worries! always love helping readers, and if i'm as good as people say i am, bit of a shame if i dont share myself.  >Current Outlook: 8 of Hearts, Jack of Clubs, King of Clubs, Jack of Spades >Advice: 2 of Clubs, 6 of Hearts, 4 of Clubs you'd be right in saying that there is a blockage right now, but it's not something that the timeline necessarily cares about, or is trying to inflict upon you. what i mean by that is if you want to solve it anytime in the near future (within a year) , you have to take a good amount of effort onto yourself. its not for lack of want on your side, but rather you have just a bit more growing/maturing to do before you have opportunities "pouring in". you have good potential to meet some new people, and if you want to, the best way to do it would be finding people that are intellectually either a match or in the same sector of interests as you, i. e. communities around hobbies, games, music, w. e you have as part of what makes you, you. it's perfectly fine to stay content, but a little bit of *discontent* with your situation also seems to be the pusher in the future that the timeline will throw your way in order to get you going, so basically, at some point the loneliness will likely get to you. it's best then to try and prepare ahead of time and start building some non-romantic connections in the fashion i said prior, and then you'll be well equipped past that to be able to eradicate the blockage. in essence, find something that you REALLY enjoy doing, and then try to share that something with others, as well as your experiences. it'll start falling into place afterwards!
i can do a read for you, no trade necessary. just tag me with your q!
damn, that's the third time someone has said that i terrify them with my reads! maybe i should make some huge misses sometimes to be more approachable. .. ^. ^
i have the biggest ego and its totally deserved :D (i just hide it, very poorly)

i can, but don't let anyone else know! ! i'm hiding and waiting to see how wrong i was. .. >6 of Hearts, 2 of Clubs, 4 of Spades, Jack of Clubs i'd say that this relationship can work out, but it won't be without its troubles. essentially you'll just have to make sure you navigate any problems smartly, rather than allowing your emotions to reign. pulling for an additional advice card for fun gave out a 9 of Hearts, which pretty much says there's a lot of strong potential here long term, so long as you get past any initial bumps and hurdles. best of luck!  hmm, if you don't know nine, and you deff aren't poncho. .. i honestly wouldn't have a guess, truly! are you someone that i've talked with privately before? if not, my memory is likely to be rather faded by now :( disadvantage to taking in so much info on a daily basis. if we have, i really have no clue who you could be! and if i don't know you already, how would i be able to guess your identity? :P

oh! not at all who i had in mind then, but that's expected. mm, i think it's safe to say i'm effectively clueless then heh. at least, that's what i would say if i were to continue ignoring what's screaming in my mind. 9? if its not you, then you've entirely bested me and i have no clue :P actually that was my first guess prior, but i visibly talked myself out of it. next time must just go with the first thought, stupid analyzing brain!

no problem! ! glad i was able to give some extra hope. just remember the little bit of advice i gave you and you should be good to go ^. ^provided no one else has any feedback or followup questions, i'll likely be lurking for the rest of the night. v happy i could come back and help some people out again!

aww, with so little information? it's almost as if you expect me to be able to get this right. and it's not like you wouldn't ask if i didn't know who you could possibly be, so there's only ~15 different answers as far as i know, assuming i have a good grasp. and i've stated before i'm rather good at reading people based on the text they offer up, so it'd be expected that you don't give up a lot on that message. enough deductive reasoning. are you sure you want me to? weren't you on a break?

no worries on that! i just struggled for half an hour to actually come up with one heh >_< as for your read; >King of Clubs, King of Hearts, 10 of Diamonds there's a solid future in the waiting, likely what you asked for and more! but it's just going to take a lot of cooperation and love from both sides in order to succeed. at the moment, the timeline is poised to support you in the endeavor, which is more than what most people can get, so you're well off. do your best not to obsess over the outcome or future, and live as you feel best, and it'll work out for you.    thanks a ton! it's a bad habit of mine to always want more than i can have at a given moment, and always into the future as well. but i'm working on getting past that for this immediate situation to "get out". for a tiny bit of context, i've had the worst few weeks in the past year and a half, cycling from a few days of feeling mentally shit to a few days of feeling physically shit, back and forth. i'm sure i'll get it sorted soon. a place of stagnation from not enough prior work, that i'm going to do my best to break through once i'm physically well enough to go at it. thanks for the read! glad i could finally have one to offer, im rather notorious for never trading among most of the readers heh.  appreciate the feedback! it's likely that it could be min wage, that's about what i was feeling. that it's just cheap work, even if she's not explicitly better. i hope you can get what you're looking for, just make sure i have a querent that can come back some day, or doesn't have to! :)  yw for the read! !

thats if you're using it for only practical reasons like you'd use something akin to LoA. divination is a valuable tool for finding information outside of just "how get rich/when new gf/etc".   saying that when cheswick exists is kind of boring

in the specific tries i've done, we've both planned to be in the same "area" at the same time, so that the person could confirm whether or not they saw what they could recognize as me. usually it worked out, save for a couple odd circumstances where she was stopped along the way. otherwise, if i don't have a plan for the night, i've been known to show up elsewhere randomly at times, without my own knowledge. way i had it explained was i was just prone to travel! i've never heard anything negative, just that they knew it was me in the same fashion  well, that'd need me to be able to do it consciously! so far the only way i've been able to do things like that is subconsciously or unconsciously. not with my waking mind. hence why i focus a lot on making sure i'm in alignment
yep! in dreams, in whatever you might consider the upper layer/astral to be, i have people i trust that have seen and/or interacted with me. my memory is just kind of blocked off :/

well! i mean. .. i understand not wanting to share then, lmao. i don't have any memory of my own, but i'm known to show up and leave a distinct mark at times, so i'm not toooo surprised. thanks for saving my dignity though :P

hey poncho i'm awake now, next time you're around, if you wanted to talk about that at all! if you saw me that's definitely very interesting, i have been known to "wander", so to speak. but i dont have memory when i do so, as of yet :/ if you're willing to offer up a few details as a type of "vision" read i wouldnt mind hearing! of course, its entirely your info to withhold as well :)
i mean to say, no blood on my deck. only patience and practice!
for clarity, im just kidding, i know that'll come naturally eventually. just a matter of when its the right time for me to be able to!

>3 of Diamonds, Queen of Diamonds, King of Spades, 2 of Spades ultimately, the encounter was fated to happen in one way or another, but the end result of this relationship is going to be a good amount of pain for both parties. little problems will build up until some big disagreement/discontent from the other part will rear its head. its odd that i don't see any hearts whatsoever. i'd think on the outset this means the relationship may be manipulative in nature. basically, the circumstances surrounding that path at the moment don't look too great. it looks like you'll have to take it upon yourself to make sure things don't go too awry, since the timeline wants to make it that way. likely that you'll need to establish a strong baseline of communication and keep yourself vigilant, but trusting

heh well, 3 for the number of tries to do something proper, my "significant number" is 17. and maybe it is a bad omen, i'm known to be rather unlucky sometimes ; ) i don't plan on it. specifically, if it's going to lead where i think it is, the timing isn't right yet for me. or everything else for that matter! but don't worry about pain for me. the only risk for me in this life is that i'll lose control of my mind and sense of self.  sure thing, shuffling now. and thanks for the well worded question :)

think that's all from me, for now. if anyone needs a followup, feel free to namedrop me and i'll see it sometime, will be lurking. thanks for all the questions, hope you all can get where you want to be :)

>3 of Diamonds, 7 of Clubs, 9 of Hearts it had a bit of the intended effect, but it needed a bit more "emotional" fuel of some kind. you had it setup proper and everything, but the intent behind was lacking just a little to keep it from having the full results that you were looking for. it worked a bit though :)  >9 of Spades, 7 of Hearts gives me the feeling that it'll be rather rough, market likely only going to continue to get worse as time goes, but if you prepare properly there will likely be a good opportunity that opens up for you sometime in the future that you can take. it just might not be what you currently think your ideal conditions are  >9 of Hearts, Ace of Diamonds, Queen of Diamonds turns out this is about what i was feeling. you'll have to make sure your connection emotionally with her stays strong, likely a requirement for high quality communication, full honesty. and you have, have, HAVE to believe in yourself. the more questions you ask, the more shakey the ground will get. its best to stay vigilant for signs on the path to take, but don't dig too deep. it will be meant to happen one day, somehow. it likely has to sneak up on you a bit though. and i appreciate the consideration. maybe one day i'll be able to do those questions directly, and give yes/no answers. but, i like to promise accuracy so until i can, i'll likely turn those down or ask for rewording :(

>Queen of Hearts, Jack of Hearts, 8 of Spades the spirit is approaching you from a place of love and care, but there seems to be a slight amount of trouble hidden beneath this persona. it could be something as simple as they want to be able to use you for something in the future, or they'll try setting you on a difficult path in order to show you a lesson.  >Ace of Hearts, 7 of Clubs, 9 of Spades you'll be able to manage it by the end of the year, but it might take just that long, or even into the next quarter. it'll also require you to apply yourself and keep on your path, but you likely already knew that. there's a bit of trouble on the horizon but its not meant to cut your goal off entirely, just to be a speedbump. such is life.  >9 of Diamonds, Jack of Hearts, Jack of Clubs basically, it has the potential to fulfill you in more ways than one. it's practically set up for you to take, and was a "planned" event for you. you'll be able to learn and improve yourself a lot, both emotionally and intellectually.  i can read it for you, then, but it just might not be entirely accurate! butterfly effect changes a lot in a few years. if you don't mind that, i can still do it for fun :)    sorry, i meant to say that the question i need to ask instead of will you achieve your goal is "what is left to do in order for you to achieve your goal". if i ask "will you", in this situation, it'll alter the end to not work out in your favor anymore, since you showed a bit of doubt that you would succeed in the end. one of the downsides of getting a read from me. if you dont want me to ask that first question, i'd likely try to get another reader to help you out.

i posted when the thread was falling, to see if i could limit my intake, then it explodes! i have a max of 5, and i'm going to do first come first serve of decent questions. firstly, ones that i don't have to reword.   1/5   2/5   3/5   4/5i'll add on two more since there was a lot of interest, but i need to narrow it down a bit.  if you want me to answer this, you should consent to me asking what the requirements are for you to have your desires met, instead. if not, lmk. maybe 5/6  same for you. assuming you want to be able to buy your apartment and not rent, i can ask what the requirements are left for you to succeed in that path. maybe 6/6  thanks poncho :) just hoping i can move quick enough to keep everyone satisfied. starting my shuffles now. gonna do a couple at a time, so my responses might be a tiny bit delayed.

your local cartomancer back again, accepting requests for the next hour, at most 5. have a CLEAR, WELL THOUGHT OUT question. i can promise complete accuracy. think about asking me a question like having the equivalent to google for the universe/timeline. i reserve the right to reword your question, but it will only usually be in a way to make getting the info you want easier for the both of us. make sure when you ask your question you include your significant number (one which resonates strongly, is your favorite, you find randomly most often, etc) .
yep! that's the artist name, and then the obscenely long title of the song :)

hey poncho. is it too late to change the song that's my anthem? :) i thought about it a lot more, and this song is the one that actually perfectly resonates with my essence when i'm reading. https://www. youtube. com/watch? v=-OR979RU4Og

relationship ones are very difficult if you're susceptible to that. if its something sensitive that you REALLY WANT to happen, it's best to not ask the question, since asking the question can sometimes make it not happen, just on the merit that you couldn't handle not knowing. but take this advice with the grain of salt that this is how i've known it to work for me, not others. others say it works the opposite. i think that what matters most is what the person who is asking the question believes and holds in their heart to be true. this can be changed over time through brute force, but it takes effort too.

part of the journey in learning how to read is being able to have the confidence that your intuition is leading you the right way. of course that's really easy to just say. you can find someone you know is a good reader and trust to try and run cards past every once in a while when you're unsure, or need to double check. there's also the aspect that, sometimes, that doubt is what makes things turn out the "wrong" or not the predicted way. truly, i'd start by doing reads and practicing with things that aren't going to have a direct effect on decisions you will make. and once you get a good feel for it there, moving on to "what will happen if i. .. " type questions

synchronicity is very, very powerful. can't discount the innate randomness that exists within a well-shuffled deck of cards, even mathematically its practically impossible for a 54 deck to have two of the same iteration once shuffled, and thats for playing cards. tarot cards are >70 usually, as well as able to be upside and reversed. every single permutation and shuffle is unique

the key is in obfuscating and encrypting the "worthwhile" information to uselessness. and those websites you're thinking of are easily able to be hacked on the regular, its just a matter of effort, and why you'd want to do it. most people don't give a shit about one mom and pop store running word-press and running their purchases through a 3rd party. they're going to go after a bigger target with more worth, unless its for practice, in which case the site would just be an unlucky target. i really wouldn't worry about it unless you're holding sensitive information, in which case, you'll know the protocols you need to go through in order to store that "properly" and not get yourself in trouble. its all built on a bunch of half broken sticks and tape.

i don't hold myself down to a specific industry in terms of programming. i'm qualified for practically any sector, whatever contract i get, i'll do. worked in cybersecurity, just plain IT, law, etc. i plan on doing research eventually, once i settle down. truly a masochist in that aspect lol  if its a proper cartomancer, they'll include the jokers with the deck, so 54. they don't mimic tarot in the slightest, but they serve their own purpose very well.
i consider an hour or two stint of coding to be a stretch of work :) hope you're well poncho!

hello everyone. i'm a bit busy for today, so i won't be able to offer reads. but i'd like to receive any feedback from prior querents, and maybe take followups between work stretches if a read calls out to me. hope everyone can find the peace they desire or the action they need for the week :)
not sure if mine is more soft or melancholic, but i just always try to be chill :)
glad i could offer some useful words for you, sometime :)

it feels like it would be hard to do it on your own, doesnt it? after all, if you start off being susceptible to your own biases, its hard to break out of sometimes. you can always go to another reader to confirm, or ask for assistance interpreting. but truthfully, the easiest questions to ask the cards to explore yourself are, logically, the ones that would get to know someone the quickest. you intend yourself in a read, what i like to call a "soul read", make it so that you show who you are in a set of cards. whatever in your own words would best translate to capturing someone's characteristics in a set of cards. then you can find your negative aspects, or just straight up ask the card what your current blind spots are, then take it as seriously as possible and try to find a good interpretation. the best path for question asking is much like the best way to find information on google, or even more recently like eliciting the exact response you want from an AI. think logically about what pointed question would lend you the most info that you need to hear, and dont be afraid to clarify. as you get better, you'll be able to hone your intuition more. (please note, this is all from my own personal experience :) i could be entirely wrong for you. use what resonates. )

i think of it like spoilers. past using it to immediately find information, anything past that kind of ruins the point of life in the first place. i try not to get too many reads done on myself for that reason. that, and i trust myself to have the proper strength/confidence/intuition i need in order to move forward with whatever paths i want.

>8 of Diamonds, 9 of Spades, Ace of Hearts it'll happen for you, but only if you have absolute faith/confidence in yourself to be able to get it. there will be a bit of a struggle, but if you do your best, you'll be able to get the job you're looking for. i wish you the luck you need!  >Jack of Hearts, Queen of Spades, Jack of Clubs, 4 of Hearts with what you have at the moment, you'll have to follow your heart over your mind in order to help things out. there's a good amount of trouble thats in the middle of it, and the only thing in it to breach the gap is a bit of calm thought, and then a lot of care. but there's not too much more aside that you can do. the cards don't show a good timing for it yet.  no problem? :)  >King of Spades, Ace of Diamonds, Jack of Clubs there's going to be an opportunity soon that will be presented in order to overcome the trouble, and only then you'll have to execute on it and let what happens, happen, maintaining a cool head. hope this "warning" can help assist :) or maybe things will change to be easier!

>Jack of Hearts, 4 of Spades, 3 of Hearts, 9 of Hearts i'd take this to mean that there is a lot of love possible in the relationship, but its locked behind a bit of difficulty at the moment. some type of communication issue, a small lie between you two, nothing big but it is in the air, somewhat. theres no divinity here, but that doesnt mean it's not "meant to be" or a good relationship. still very high love values :)  >8 of Diamonds, 7 of Clubs, Queen of Clubs it says that there will be, provided you don't try to fight the events that happen and play your role to the best of your ability. you'll have to be smart about it, and do what you can, but eventually there will be something in store :)  >Queen of Diamonds, 8 of Clubs, 3 of Hearts, Jack of Clubs i asked whether or not the person you are with currently is the one who is meant for you. there is a high value of divinity and intelligence that was involved in the planning of this relationship, and some love is present, nothing negative overall. i would say this has the basis for a strong relationship and was definitely an event that was setup beforehand for you. of course, things could change in the future if you decide that they should. your will is what matters most, after all  appreciate it, and its no problem, i just like to make sure im helping the best i can!  one of my favorite artists :) early 20's as well. some stuff is just good. .. onto the next ones very soon, but i did say only 5. im sorry to anyone who didnt get in in time, i try to come back around often, and there are plenty of other talented readers that show up as well!

i linked mine above, figured you'd come and ask me sometime lol, i would say this represents my journey best so far.  i could probably tell you which ends up being the better/easier path, but i can't truly say which one you WILL be doing. unless you mean to say that you're trying to get to that other job, in which case, i can tell you the requirements left for you to make sure that you can go down that road. sorry, just wanna make sure i get the question you really want answered. 1/5  i can read what the nature of your relationship is with this person. ill shuffle on that now, unless you decide that isnt okay in which case lmk soon. 2/5   3/5   4/5only one more left!  if you want this one to be answered, i'll need your number as well

your local cartomancer back again, accepting requests for the next hour, at most 5. have a CLEAR, WELL THOUGHT OUT question. i can promise complete accuracy. think about asking me a question like having the equivalent to google for the universe/timeline. i reserve the right to reword your question, but it will only usually be in a way to make getting the info you want easier for the both of us. make sure when you ask your question you include your significant number (one which resonates strongly, is your favorite, you find randomly most often, etc) .

>5 of Clubs, 7 of Diamonds, 7 of Clubs, 3 of Clubs, 7 of Spades going by the numbers, i'd say that you experience a lot more luck and health in your relationship when you bring a moderately rational perspective in. you're a good thinking partner, probably a very good listener, but you might find yourself with a tendency to overthink as well. and once that happens, is when you might find things going poorly. basically you are very reliable, but if the stress starts to affect you a lot, you could have a tendency to make things worse, rather than help. >7 of Spades, Jack of Hearts i asked specifically next, what you can do to overcome that bit of trouble. in the most basic sense, when you might notice that things are going odd, or will be, lead with your heart, and not with your head. prioritize yours and your partner's emotions and communication above all, and you'll be far better off! :) if you have any other questions, let me know. im glad to help

the issue with being skeptical is that you take all the fun out for yourself. say that you get a read, and it tells you about what your future girlfriend might be like. someone who isnt skeptical but just interested, takes that info and is reassured a bit, and then is surprised to find it comes out true, albeit not in a way they were expecting. someone who is skeptical receives a read. that information's in your mind now, and since you're driving yourself as an antagonistic force towards that info, it wont be true. its a self-fulfilling prophecy. in fact, my own growth as a reader used this path. i started my reads while as a huge skeptic, saying there was no way that these could effectively be telling any sort of useful info. any info i got turned out to be the exact opposite. is that because the cards are wrong? or is that because my knowledge of the information affected the flow. even then, it took me years to be able to read without "affecting" things. so in the end, it truly is a matter of belief. do or dont, it doesnt really affect us here. only yourself, and what possibilities are open to you.

i mean not to sound too crazy here, genome editing is real. which means genes are easily alterable, for the right price. and a proper sentient AI wouldn't be a philosophical zombie, so that's not what i'm referring to.

your genes can be altered. once that happens, you've lost what the original code had in mind. even if you consider the creation of the tool which led to that ability what the code had in mind, that means you understand that a tool could be created in order to defy the prior laws. if not for yourself, for your own offspring as well. if you believe that details can be altered, you can alter the details until things are different entirely. although, you can't see the human brain as losing its uniqueness. we are gaining a better understanding of how we understand things by researching neural networks. AI is a tool like any other at the moment, but eventually, if we can achieve a semblance of sentience and iterated improvement, whos to say that what that thing becomes wasn't just a natural "epitome"? you should check out machinic desire. it's very intriguing and relates to this topic. the world is what you make of it, and your cognitive control one of the strongest abilities you can have. there's no downside to trying and believing. the only thing you risk losing with new thought patterns, is desolation.

this just factually isnt true. what if someone has their genes altered? CRISPR exists. then your genes aren't what matter anymore, but the genes of the people who researched the science that made that possible? people can be products of their environment but they are also fully capable of being a "black sheep" in such spaces too, if they chose to be. the work we do here reads the current path of what's going to happen, and if we can do that, we can also read on how to make that NOT happen. and then it's our choice whether or not to follow through. we still struggle to have perfect simulations with machines. as much as a proponent of technology that i am, there are limitations currently. we can get there in the future, but we also are realising that things aren't concrete. quantum mechanics doesn't let that be so. we can determine the probability of things occurring, not whether or not for certain that thing will occur (in science, as of now) . and there's no reason to see that to change. in fact, one of the biggest problems in mathematics and computing is relating directly to fluid mechanics and how we can't perfectly simulate it yet, and don't know if we will be able to (i believe it'll be solvable someday, but much in the same fashion. ) there is innate randomness to this world, which we can calculate probabilities of, but we can't account for what scenario is going to occur 100% of the time, simply because something will occur specifically just to spite that.

but i'm neither of those things. i make my own decisions entirely, regardless of what the timeline has in plan for me. and if we have ways of knowing what that is, we also have ways of knowing how to negate that, and get it to not happen. with enough information, its possible. and predicting the future is possible, save for one thing; the innate chaos of certain human interactions. for some things, the act of knowing that it'll happen is enough for it to not be so anymore. are these things equivalent to your destiny, just because you "know" they might happen? if you're the one making the decision as to what path you go down, then i'd consider that a semblance of free will. and enough to grab onto, in hopes for more in the future. reality isn't stable either. observations are affected by the observer. this means you can have a direct effect on the world around you, if your cognition is suited for it. but if its not, you're stuck. its an interesting talk anyways. not often people get to talking specifically about the nature of things in this part of the board :)

i'll always take issue with that statement, but that's just my nature to do so. rebel spirit, and all that. i believe in exercising my free will to go against my "destiny" and supposed purpose, in order to achieve more, and my own personal, selfish goals. and i know it's possible. the timeline is fluid, and with enough willpower, time, and knowledge, practically anything can be altered. if you find yourself unable, there's a lacking in one of these areas.

if you believe yourself to be chained to a destiny, then it shall be that way. if you believe in the opposite, you can exercise your own free will. i liken the journey one takes through life and time to a running river. you can choose to allow it to pull you along, allow yourself to sink, or swim with the current for a while, and then eventually gain enough momentum to make your own way. but you can't know to do this if you don't think that you could possibly be able to leave the borders in the first place. at the same time, if you recognize the current, and only exist to spite it, you likely won't get far.
